id: get up (i feel like being a) sex machine
name: Get Up (I Feel Like Being a) Sex Machine
author: James Brown

wikipedia.title: Get Up (I Feel Like Being a) Sex Machine
wikipedia.extract: "Get Up (I Feel Like Being a) Sex Machine" is a song recorded by James Brown with Bobby Byrd on backing vocals. Released as a two-part single in 1970, it was a no. 2 R&B hit and reached no. 15 on the Billboard Hot 100.In 2004, "Sex Machine" was ranked number 326 on Rolling Stone magazine's list of the 500 greatest songs of all time.
